name: HaleOS
body: ### Welcome to HaleOS! Here you observe a simple x64 bit operating system in the making. Straight from Mann Co. This OS is as bare as Saxton Hale's own zoo. He'll endanger all of those software bloat like he's endangered hundreds of other animals! ![](http://i.imgur.com/R7MDxQB.jpg?1?2514) ### Building HaleOS Building HOS is pretty straight forward: ``` $ git clone https://github.com/Jyang772/HaleOS.git $ make ``` ### Authors and Contributors You can contact me at: justin@micropenguin.net ### Support or Contact Having trouble with Hale? Check out the documentation provided in the Docs folder. Be sure to check out our [Forum](forums.micropenguin.net)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
